item.title: [PI] adding donaters symbol and yell ranks help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Change this;

c.memberStatus >= 2

to this;

c.memberStatus == 2 && c.playerRights == 0

Basically, instead of basing it off just a int value for the player, you always make sure that the player has the rights of 0, ex: normal player (in this case).

Reason why your Gfx Person can do all the owner commands;
Her player rights are

c.playerRights = 5

Your commands are most likely set if the player rights are >= 3 or 2, basically in this case, if you only have one gfx artist i would do the yell command for the username, and not the rights,

if(player.getUsername().equals("namehere")) {

Not sure on the get method of username for PI, but iâ€™m sure you can figure it out

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] adding donaters symbol and yell ranks help
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

Hello,

Im trying to add a rank for donaters so when they talk it shows $ symbol next to their name?
how would i do this on me project insanity base?

also i added a yell rank for donaters but it does not show its seems that player rank goes over it?
as well as that
i have made a rank for my gfx artist but it also allows her to do all commands including owners,
this is my yell code

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { String rank = ""; String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase(); if (c.memberStatus >= 2) { rank = "@gre@[$Donator] "+ c.playerName +": "; } if (c.playerRights >= 0) { rank = "[Player] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerRights >= 1) { rank = "@sil@[Moderator] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerRights >= 2) { rank = "@gol@[Admin] "+ c.playerName +":"; } if (c.playerRights >= 3) { rank = "@red@[Owner] "+ c.playerName +": "; } if (c.playerRights >= 5) { rank = "@sil@[gfx artist] "+ c.playerName +":"; }

can any1 help please?

Read full topic
